column.name: integer_value
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(i.id) from item i where i.internal_number = 'CDR-INBOUND' and i.global = 'true'),1)

column.name: integer_value
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(i.id) from item i where i.internal_number = 'CDR-AR' and i.global = 'true'),1)

column.name: integer_value
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(i.id) from item i where i.internal_number = 'CDR-CHAT' and i.global = 'true'),1)

column.name: integer_value
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(i.id) from item i where i.internal_number = 'CDR-IVR-I' and i.global = 'true'),1)

column.name: integer_value
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(it.id) from item_type it where it.description = 'Fees' and it.global = 'true'),1)

column.name: integer_value
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(it.id) from item_type it where it.description = 'Adjustments' and it.global = 'true'),1)

column.name: task_id

delete.where: task_id in (select id from pluggable_task where type_id in (select t.id from pluggable_task_type t where t.category_id = 6) and entity_id = ${child.entity.id})
type_id in (select id from pluggable_task_type where category_id = 6) and entity_id = ${child.entity.id}

column.value:
$usagePoolQuantity $overageRatePerMinute $accountNumber

The overage rate above will apply for any further minutes used this month. If you have a credit card on file with us, it will be charged automatically on Fridays for this overage to keep your account on track.

column.name: content

style="font-size:18px;font-weight: 500;line-height:25px;padding-bottom:10px;">If it's still early in the month, we suggest moving to a larger plan so we can avoid overages and bill you at the best rate for your usage. You can do this anytime in Online Access, or by clicking the Change Plan button below.

column.name: item_id
column.valueComputed: (select max(i.id) from item i where i.internal_number = 'CDR-AR' and i.global = 'true')

column.name: usage_pool_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT max(up.id) FROM usage_pool up where quantity = '85.0000000000' and entity_id = '${child.entity.id}')

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from jbilling_seqs where name = 'usage_pool_consumption_actions';

changeSet.id: #delete from notification message with type id 26
changeSet.author: Pranay G. Raherkar

delete.where: message_section_id in (select id from notification_message_section where message_id in (select id from notification_message where include_attachment is null and type_id =26 and entity_id='${child.entity.id}'));
message_id in (select id from notification_message where include_attachment is null and type_id =26 and entity_id='${child.entity.id}')
include_attachment is null and type_id =26 and entity_id='${child.entity.id}'

changeSet.id: #JBFC-661 Added customer level meta field and configured plugin
changeSet.author: Pranay G. Raherkar

column.name: type_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(p.id) from pluggable_task_type p where p.class_name = 'com.sapienter.jbilling.server.usagePool.task.SwapPlanFUPTransferTask')
